TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Unit categories have been changed completely in this mod. Now modern units are superior to ancient units.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les catégories d'Unités ont complètement changé dans ce mod. Les Unités modernes sont maintenant nettement supérieures aux unités anciennes.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Unit categories have been changed completely in this mod. Now modern units are superior to ancient units.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Unit categories have been changed completely in this mod. Now modern units are superior to ancient units.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Unit categories have been changed completely in this mod. Now modern units are superior to ancient units.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Religions have been changed to be more unique. This means that effects of each religion are slightly different and religious buildings have new effects.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les Religions ont été modifiées pour être plus uniques. Cela signifie que les effets de chaque religion sont légèrement différents, et que les bâtiments religieux entraînent de nouveaux effets.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Religions have been changed to be more unique. This means that effects of each religion are slightly different and religious buildings have new effects.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Religions have been changed to be more unique. This means that effects of each religion are slightly different and religious buildings have new effects.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Religions have been changed to be more unique. This means that effects of each religion are slightly different and religious buildings have new effects.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Civics have 2 new categories and new options have been added to original categories. All civics have been changed with new effects.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les Doctrines sont réparties avec deux nouvelles catégories et de nouvelles options et combinaisons ont été ajoutées. Tous les effets des doctrines ont été modifiés.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Civics have 2 new categories and new options have been added to original categories. All civics have been changed with new effects.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Civics have 2 new categories and new options have been added to original categories. All civics have been changed with new effects.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Civics have 2 new categories and new options have been added to original categories. All civics have been changed with new effects.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There are now building upgrade paths. Once you upgrade building to newer, the older will be removed from city. New building will have the effects from the old building plus new effects. Harbor starts one upgrade path.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a maintenant des possibilités d'améliorer les bâtiments : le nouveau bâtiment remplace l'ancien, mais va cumuler les effets du bâtiment qu'il remplace.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There are now building upgrade paths. Once you upgrade building to newer, the older will be removed from city. New building will have the effects from the old building plus new effects. Harbor starts one upgrade path.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There are now building upgrade paths. Once you upgrade building to newer, the older will be removed from city. New building will have the effects from the old building plus new effects. Harbor starts one upgrade path.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There are now building upgrade paths. Once you upgrade building to newer, the older will be removed from city. New building will have the effects from the old building plus new effects. Harbor starts one upgrade path.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Guard your coastal cities. Harbors, Ports, Commercial Ports and International Port have 100% conquer success rate. Don't let your enemy to get access to economy bonuses that those buildings give.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Faites Garder vos cités côtières. Les ports ont des taux de succès de conquête de 100%. Ne laissez pas vos ennemis bénéficier de ces bonus.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Guard your coastal cities. Harbors, Ports, Commercial Ports and International Port have 100% conquer success rate. Don't let your enemy to get access to economy bonuses that those buildings give.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Guard your coastal cities. Harbors, Ports, Commercial Ports and International Port have 100% conquer success rate. Don't let your enemy to get access to economy bonuses that those buildings give.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Guard your coastal cities. Harbors, Ports, Commercial Ports and International Port have 100% conquer success rate. Don't let your enemy to get access to economy bonuses that those buildings give.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: You may build maximum of 4 Great Wonders per city and 4 National Wonders per city. Plan ahead where you build your wonders.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Vous pouvez construire au maximum 4 Merveilles et 4 Grands projets nationaux par Ville. Planifiez donc bien l'emplacement de ceux-ci.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: You may build maximum of 4 Great Wonders per city and 4 National Wonders per city. Plan ahead where you build your wonders.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: You may build maximum of 4 Great Wonders per city and 4 National Wonders per city. Plan ahead where you build your wonders.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: You may build maximum of 4 Great Wonders per city and 4 National Wonders per city. Plan ahead where you build your wonders.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There are many new unit categories in this mod. See civilopedia to learn more about these units.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a beaucoup de nouvelles unités dans ce mod. Voir la civilopédia pour en apprendre plus sur ces unités.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There are many new unit categories in this mod. See civilopedia to learn more about these units.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There are many new unit categories in this mod. See civilopedia to learn more about these units.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There are many new unit categories in this mod. See civilopedia to learn more about these units.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Mines work differently now. They automatically upgrade to Shaft Mine just like Cottage upgrades to Town. Mines also give +1 hammer when you build road there.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les aménagements de terrain comme les mines peuvent également évoluer : Elles sont améliorées automatiquement en puits de mine (même système que pour les cotages). De plus, construire une route près d'une mine permet +1 en production.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Mines work differently now. They automatically upgrade to Shaft Mine just like Cottage upgrades to Town. Mines also give +1 hammer when you build road there.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Mines work differently now. They automatically upgrade to Shaft Mine just like Cottage upgrades to Town. Mines also give +1 hammer when you build road there.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Mines work differently now. They automatically upgrade to Shaft Mine just like Cottage upgrades to Town. Mines also give +1 hammer when you build road there.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Tech tree has been completely redone. Many buildings from normal Beyond the Sword game has been moved to new techs.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: L'arbre de Tech a été complètement revu. Beaucoup de bâtiments de Civ4 BTS nécessitent maintenant une technologie correspondante.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Tech tree has been completely redone. Many buildings from normal Beyond the Sword game has been moved to new techs.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Tech tree has been completely redone. Many buildings from normal Beyond the Sword game has been moved to new techs.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Tech tree has been completely redone. Many buildings from normal Beyond the Sword game has been moved to new techs.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There are several new Promotion lines and there has been made changes to almost all BtS promotions.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a quelques Promotions supplémentaires et les promotions originales ont été revues.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There are several new Promotion lines and there has been made changes to almost all BtS promotions.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There are several new Promotion lines and there has been made changes to almost all BtS promotions.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There are several new Promotion lines and there has been made changes to almost all BtS promotions.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Early gunpowder units require now Sulphur resource.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les premières unités avec des armes à feu ont besoin de Soufre.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Early gunpowder units require now Sulphur resource.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Early gunpowder units require now Sulphur resource.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Early gunpowder units require now Sulphur resource.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Most gunpowder units require Ammunition resource. Make sure you don't forgot to build Weapon Factories.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: La plupart des Unités utilisant des armes à feu ont besoin de munitions à présent. Soyez sûr de ne pas oublier de construire une Usine d'armement.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Most gunpowder units require Ammunition resource. Make sure you don't forgot to build Weapon Factories.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Most gunpowder units require Ammunition resource. Make sure you don't forgot to build Weapon Factories.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Most gunpowder units require Ammunition resource. Make sure you don't forgot to build Weapon Factories.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Naval units from Industrial era start to require Steel resource. Build Steel Mills to produce Steel from Coal and Iron. If you don't have access to those resources, build Ironworks national wonder. It gives Steel without those other resources.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il vous faudra de l'Acier pour construire Les Unités Navales à partir de l'Ere industrielle. Construisez des Aciéries pour en produire à partir du charbon et du fer. Si vous ne possédez pas ces ressources, Construisez L'Usine sidérurgique (projet National) qui vous permettra d'obtenir de l'acier sans conditions.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Naval units from Industrial era start to require Steel resource. Build Steel Mills to produce Steel from Coal and Iron. If you don't have access to those resources, build Ironworks national wonder. It gives Steel without those other resources.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Naval units from Industrial era start to require Steel resource. Build Steel Mills to produce Steel from Coal and Iron. If you don't have access to those resources, build Ironworks national wonder. It gives Steel without those other resources.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Naval units from Industrial era start to require Steel resource. Build Steel Mills to produce Steel from Coal and Iron. If you don't have access to those resources, build Ironworks national wonder. It gives Steel without those other resources.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Mod has been designed for big maps and for Marathon game speed.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Le Mod a été conçu pour de grandes cartes et la vitesse de jeu Marathon.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Mod has been designed for big maps and for Marathon game speed.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Mod has been designed for big maps and for Marathon game speed.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Mod has been designed for big maps and for Marathon game speed.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Movement costs have been changed for certain terrain types. See terrain and feature civilopedia pages.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les coûts de déplacement ont été modifiés pour certains types de terrain. Plus de détails aux rubriques correspondantes de la Civilopedia.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Movement costs have been changed for certain terrain types. See terrain and feature civilopedia pages.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Movement costs have been changed for certain terrain types. See terrain and feature civilopedia pages.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Movement costs have been changed for certain terrain types. See terrain and feature civilopedia pages.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Game start year has been set to 6000BC. All game speeds have more turns than in normal BtS game.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: L'année de Démarrage du Jeu est de 6000 av. J-C. Il y a donc plus de tours que dans le jeu normal, quelle que soit la vitesse de jeu.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Game start year has been set to 6000BC. All game speeds have more turns than in normal BtS game.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Game start year has been set to 6000BC. All game speeds have more turns than in normal BtS game.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Game start year has been set to 6000BC. All game speeds have more turns than in normal BtS game.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Citizens consume now 3 food instead of 2. There are new building types that give bonus to city's food production.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les Citoyens consomment maintenant 3 Nourriture au lieu de 2. Il y a des nouveaux bâtiments permettant d'obtenir des bonus de production de Nourriture.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Citizens consume now 3 food instead of 2. There are new building types that give bonus to city's food production.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Citizens consume now 3 food instead of 2. There are new building types that give bonus to city's food production.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Citizens consume now 3 food instead of 2. There are new building types that give bonus to city's food production.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There are new resources and new improvement types. New techs give bonuses to some improvements.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a de nouvelles ressources et de nouvelles améliorations de terrain. Les Nouvelles Techs donnent des bonus à certaines de ces améliorations.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There are new resources and new improvement types. New techs give bonuses to some improvements.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There are new resources and new improvement types. New techs give bonuses to some improvements.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There are new resources and new improvement types. New techs give bonuses to some improvements.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Encyclopedia project gives access to all techs that 3 other Civilizations have discovered. If you're falling behind in tech race, try to complete this project.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Le Projet 'Encyclopédie' donne accès à toutes les technologies découvertent par au moins 3 civilisatoin. Donnez la priorité à ce projet si vous êtes en retard en recherche.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Encyclopedia project gives access to all techs that 3 other Civilizations have discovered. If you're falling behind in tech race, try to complete this project.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Encyclopedia project gives access to all techs that 3 other Civilizations have discovered. If you're falling behind in tech race, try to complete this project.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Encyclopedia project gives access to all techs that 3 other Civilizations have discovered. If you're falling behind in tech race, try to complete this project.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Specialize your cities.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Spécialisez vos Villes.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Specialize your cities.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Specialize your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Specialize your cities.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Colonist builds city of size 3 with several buildings and Pioneer builds city of size 4 with many buildings.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les Colonistes construisent des Villes de taille initiale 3 avec déjà quelques bâtiments, et les Pionniers des Villes de taille 4 avec beaucoup de bâtiments.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Colonist builds city of size 3 with several buildings and Pioneer builds city of size 4 with many buildings.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Colonist builds city of size 3 with several buildings and Pioneer builds city of size 4 with many buildings.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Colonist builds city of size 3 with several buildings and Pioneer builds city of size 4 with many buildings.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Most improvements no longer cut down forest or jungle. You can now have access to resources in jungle plots earlier.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: La plupart des améliorations de terrain ne suppriment pas la forêt ou la jungle. Les ressources sont donc accessibles plus tôt.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Most improvements no longer cut down forest or jungle. You can now have access to resources in jungle plots earlier.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Most improvements no longer cut down forest or jungle. You can now have access to resources in jungle plots earlier.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Most improvements no longer cut down forest or jungle. You can now have access to resources in jungle plots earlier.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Religious Shrines are no longer marked as great wonders. You can built them to Holy City even if it has max amount of Great Wonders already.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Les Lieux Saints ne sont plus considérés comme des Merveilles et ne comptent donc pas dans la limite de Merveilles par villes.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Religious Shrines are no longer marked as great wonders. You can built them to Holy City even if it has max amount of Great Wonders already.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Religious Shrines are no longer marked as great wonders. You can built them to Holy City even if it has max amount of Great Wonders already.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Religious Shrines are no longer marked as great wonders. You can built them to Holy City even if it has max amount of Great Wonders already.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: All religious buildings spread religion.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Tous les bâtiments religieux propagent la religion associée.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: All religious buildings spread religion.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: All religious buildings spread religion.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: All religious buildings spread religion.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: You can change some mod settings in the Rise of Mankind Config.ini file.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Vous pouvez changer certains paramètres dans le fichier config.ini de Rise of Mankind.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: You can change some mod settings in the Rise of Mankind Config.ini file.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: You can change some mod settings in the Rise of Mankind Config.ini file.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: You can change some mod settings in the Rise of Mankind Config.ini file.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: This modpack includes many other mods that improve the gameplay with numerous new features. You can read all about them from RoM Concepts pedia pages.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Ce 'modpack' inclus d'autres mods qui améliorent le gameplay avec de nombreuses nouvelles fonctionnalités. Se reporter aux pages Concept Rom de la Civilopédia.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: This modpack includes many other mods that improve the gameplay with numerous new features. You can read all about them from RoM Concepts pedia pages.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: This modpack includes many other mods that improve the gameplay with numerous new features. You can read all about them from RoM Concepts pedia pages.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: This modpack includes many other mods that improve the gameplay with numerous new features. You can read all about them from RoM Concepts pedia pages.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Most terrain improvements do not remove forests and there's now several late game improvements which can be placed only on forest and on jungle plots so think carefully when to chop down forests and when it's not the best option.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: La plupart des améliorations de terrain ne suppriment pas la forêt et il y a des aménagements qui doivent être placés sur la forêt ou la jungle. Soyez donc vigilant et réfléchissez avant de systématiquement déforester.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Most terrain improvements do not remove forests and there's now several late game improvements which can be placed only on forest and on jungle plots so think carefully when to chop down forests and when it's not the best option.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Most terrain improvements do not remove forests and there's now several late game improvements which can be placed only on forest and on jungle plots so think carefully when to chop down forests and when it's not the best option.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Most terrain improvements do not remove forests and there's now several late game improvements which can be placed only on forest and on jungle plots so think carefully when to chop down forests and when it's not the best option.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Scientific victory requires you to learn most Transhuman era technologies and then to build enough Paradise Gardens and Ascention Gate Great Wonder.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: La Victoire Scientifique nécessite la découverte de la plupart des technologies de l'ère Transhumaine, puis de construire suffisament de Jardins du Paradis et la Merveille Porte Ascensionnelle.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Scientific victory requires you to learn most Transhuman era technologies and then to build enough Paradise Gardens and Ascention Gate Great Wonder.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Scientific victory requires you to learn most Transhuman era technologies and then to build enough Paradise Gardens and Ascention Gate Great Wonder.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Scientific victory requires you to learn most Transhuman era technologies and then to build enough Paradise Gardens and Ascention Gate Great Wonder.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Mounted Infantry is the only mounted unit which does gain defensive bonuses. It's good unit for defense in conquered cities during war time if you want to keep your offensive units moving rapidly from city to city.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: L'Infanterie Montée est la seule unité montée à avoir un bonus défensif. C'est une unité adaptée à la défense des Villes conquises si vous voulez garder une force offensive rapide de ville en ville.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Mounted Infantry is the only mounted unit which does gain defensive bonuses. It's good unit for defense in conquered cities during war time if you want to keep your offensive units moving rapidly from city to city.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Mounted Infantry is the only mounted unit which does gain defensive bonuses. It's good unit for defense in conquered cities during war time if you want to keep your offensive units moving rapidly from city to city.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Mounted Infantry is the only mounted unit which does gain defensive bonuses. It's good unit for defense in conquered cities during war time if you want to keep your offensive units moving rapidly from city to city.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Always keep healthy pool of gold in your treasury. It might help you to survive better from certain random events.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Gardez toujours une bonne reserve d'or dans votre trésor. Cela permet de mieux surmonter certain événements aléatoires.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Always keep healthy pool of gold in your treasury. It might help you to survive better from certain random events.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Always keep healthy pool of gold in your treasury. It might help you to survive better from certain random events.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Always keep healthy pool of gold in your treasury. It might help you to survive better from certain random events.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: If you think there's still not enough content in this modpack, you could visit RoM Modmods subforum at Civfanatics.com site and install some extra modules from the several hundred modules that are available there.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Si vous trouvez qu'il n'y a toujours pas assez de contenu dans ce 'modpack', visitez les sous-forum 'RoM Modmods' sur Civfanatics.com et installez les modules additionnels disponibles.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: If you think there's still not enough content in this modpack, you could visit RoM Modmods subforum at Civfanatics.com site and install some extra modules from the several hundred modules that are available there.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: If you think there's still not enough content in this modpack, you could visit RoM Modmods subforum at Civfanatics.com site and install some extra modules from the several hundred modules that are available there.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: If you think there's still not enough content in this modpack, you could visit RoM Modmods subforum at Civfanatics.com site and install some extra modules from the several hundred modules that are available there.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [ALT+X] turns on the strategy overlay feature that allows you to plan where to put your cities. Pressing same button combination turns it off. To view the strategy overlay just press [CTRL+X].
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Appuyez sur [ALT+X] pour faire apparaître l'interface en mode édition vous permettant de planifier l'emplacement de vos Villes. La même combinaison de touches permet de la masquer à nouveau, et [CTRL+X] permet de l'afficher.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [ALT+X] turns on the strategy overlay feature that allows you to plan where to put your cities. Pressing same button combination turns it off. To view the strategy overlay just press [CTRL+X].
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [ALT+X] turns on the strategy overlay feature that allows you to plan where to put your cities. Pressing same button combination turns it off. To view the strategy overlay just press [CTRL+X].
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [ALT+X] turns on the strategy overlay feature that allows you to plan where to put your cities. Pressing same button combination turns it off. To view the strategy overlay just press [CTRL+X].

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: New era has been added to this mod. Transhuman era allows you to research over 60 near future techs and gives you access to powerful robot and mech units which also have their own promotion system. End game year has been moved from 2050AD to 2100AD.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Une nouvelle Ere a été ajouté dans ce mod. l'Ere Transhumaine vous permet d'effectuer plus de 60 nouvelles Recherches futuristes et vous donne l'accès à de puissants Robots et Unités Mech, qui ont leur propre système de promotion. La Fin du jeu a été déplacée de 2050 à 2100 ap J.C.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: New era has been added to this mod. Transhuman era allows you to research over 60 near future techs and gives you access to powerful robot and mech units which also have their own promotion system. End game year has been moved from 2050AD to 2100AD.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: New era has been added to this mod. Transhuman era allows you to research over 60 near future techs and gives you access to powerful robot and mech units which also have their own promotion system. End game year has been moved from 2050AD to 2100AD.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: New era has been added to this mod. Transhuman era allows you to research over 60 near future techs and gives you access to powerful robot and mech units which also have their own promotion system. End game year has been moved from 2050AD to 2100AD.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There is over 100 new random events in this mod.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a plus de 100 nouveaux événements aléatoires dans ce mod.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There is over 100 new random events in this mod.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There is over 100 new random events in this mod.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There is over 100 new random events in this mod.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: AI has been improved so be prepared for their new tactics. For more information see Better BtS AI pedia pages in RoM Concepts pedia section.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: L'IA a été améliorée, attendez-vous à de nouvelles tactiques. Pous plus d'infos, consultez les pages 'Better BTS AI' dans les concepts ROM de la Civilopédia.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: AI has been improved so be prepared for their new tactics. For more information see Better BtS AI pedia pages in RoM Concepts pedia section.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: AI has been improved so be prepared for their new tactics. For more information see Better BtS AI pedia pages in RoM Concepts pedia section.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: AI has been improved so be prepared for their new tactics. For more information see Better BtS AI pedia pages in RoM Concepts pedia section.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Enhanced Tech Conquest allows you to gain information about new technologies when you conquer enemy cities. If the conquered city is large enough, you might even get free technologies.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: le mod 'Enhanced Tech Conquest' vous permet d'obtenir des informations concernant des nouvelle technologies en conquérant les Villes ennemies. Si la Ville conquise est suffisament grande, vous pourrez même obtenir une technologie gratuite.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Enhanced Tech Conquest allows you to gain information about new technologies when you conquer enemy cities. If the conquered city is large enough, you might even get free technologies.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Enhanced Tech Conquest allows you to gain information about new technologies when you conquer enemy cities. If the conquered city is large enough, you might even get free technologies.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Enhanced Tech Conquest allows you to gain information about new technologies when you conquer enemy cities. If the conquered city is large enough, you might even get free technologies.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: There are plenty of Earth maps included with this modpack. You can access them through Custom Scenarios option.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Il y a plein de Carte de la Terre incluses dans ce 'modpack'. Vous pouvez y accéder via le menu, scénarios personnalisés.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: There are plenty of Earth maps included with this modpack. You can access them through Custom Scenarios option.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: There are plenty of Earth maps included with this modpack. You can access them through Custom Scenarios option.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: There are plenty of Earth maps included with this modpack. You can access them through Custom Scenarios option.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [CTRL+A] in city screen allows you to demolish buildings and even abandon the whole city. Abandoning the city gives workers and settlers if the city is large enough.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: En appuyant sur [CTRL+A] dans l'écran de Ville, vous pouvez démolir des bâtiments et même abandonner la Ville entière. La population de la Ville est convertie en Ouvriers et Colons.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [CTRL+A] in city screen allows you to demolish buildings and even abandon the whole city. Abandoning the city gives workers and settlers if the city is large enough.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [CTRL+A] in city screen allows you to demolish buildings and even abandon the whole city. Abandoning the city gives workers and settlers if the city is large enough.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Pressing [CTRL+A] in city screen allows you to demolish buildings and even abandon the whole city. Abandoning the city gives workers and settlers if the city is large enough.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: Route system has been completely redesigned and during the game you gain access to 8 different route types. Each route type has different movement speeds and some require resources and gold to build them. Advanced routes might be the key to victory during war times.
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Le système de Routes a été complètement revu, et comporte maintenant 8 type de routes. Chaque type de route engendre des vitesses de déplacement différentes et certaines routes nécessite des ressources particulières et de l'or pour être construite. Les routes avancées peuvent être la clé de la Victoire en temps de Guerre.
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: Route system has been completely redesigned and during the game you gain access to 8 different route types. Each route type has different movement speeds and some require resources and gold to build them. Advanced routes might be the key to victory during war times.
TEXT.Italian: Rise of Mankind: Route system has been completely redesigned and during the game you gain access to 8 different route types. Each route type has different movement speeds and some require resources and gold to build them. Advanced routes might be the key to victory during war times.
TEXT.Spanish: Rise of Mankind: Route system has been completely redesigned and during the game you gain access to 8 different route types. Each route type has different movement speeds and some require resources and gold to build them. Advanced routes might be the key to victory during war times.

TEXT.English: Rise of Mankind: With Barbarian World game option the barbarians start with a free city for every civilization in the game. Combined with Barbarian Civ game option you'll see those Barbarian civs to grow into new civilizations earlier than with just the Barbarian Civ game option alone - if you survive the barbarian hordes...
TEXT.French: Rise of Mankind: Avec l'option 'Monde Barbare' les barbares démarrent avec une Ville pour chaque civilisation de la partie. Combinée avec l'option 'Civ Barbare', vous allez voir ces Villes barbares rapidement faire émerger de nouvelles Civilisations - si vous survivez aux hordes barbares...
TEXT.German: Rise of Mankind: With Barbarian World game option the barbarians start with a free city for every civilization in the game. Combined with Barbarian Civ game option you'll see those Barbarian civs to grow into new civilizations earlier than with just the Barbarian Civ game option alone - if you survive the barbarian hordes...

Combined with Barbarian Civ game option you'll see those Barbarian civs to grow into new civilizations earlier than with just the Barbarian Civ game option alone - if you survive the barbarian hordes...

Combined with Barbarian Civ game option you'll see those Barbarian civs to grow into new civilizations earlier than with just the Barbarian Civ game option alone - if you survive the barbarian hordes...
